sqlMap.insert: insert into sample_boards (board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_content, board_file_name) values (sample_boards_seq.nextval, #title#, #writer#, #content#, #fileName#)
sqlMap.select:
select board_no as no, board_title as title, board_writer as writer, board_content as content, board_read_count as readCount, board_review_count as reviewCount, board_deleted as deleted, board_created_date as createdDate, board_updated_date as updatedDate from (select
row_number()over (order by board_no desc) row_numbers,
row_number()over (order by board_title asc) row_numbers,
row_number()over (order by board_read_count desc) row_numbers,
board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_content, board_read_count, board_review_count, board_deleted, board_created_date, board_updated_date from sample_boards where board_deleted = 'N'
and board_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and board_writer like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and board_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
) where row_numbers between #begin# and #end#

select count(*) from sample_boards where board_deleted = 'N'
and board_title like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and board_writer like '%' || #keyword# || '%'
and board_content like '%' || #keyword# || '%'

select board_no as no, board_title as title, board_writer as writer, board_content as content, board_read_count as readCount, board_review_count as reviewCount, board_deleted as deleted, board_created_date as createdDate, board_updated_date as updatedDate, board_file_name as fileName from sample_boards where board_no = #value#
sqlMap.update: update sample_boards set board_title = #title#, board_writer = #writer#, board_content = #content#, board_read_count = #readCount#, board_review_count = #reviewCount#, board_deleted = #deleted#, board_file_name = #fileName#, board_updated_date = sysdate where board_no = #no#
